Articles.Content:
Hey, does anyone know where to find or possibly even have a copy of that cool transforming alcubierre drive that used to go along with KSPI? I want to take it and change the config to be the USI warp drive, but I really liked that model and the transforming bit.

Any help?

edit: It was the one that ZZZ made, but I cant find it amongst his other stuff

Found it!

[http://www./download/ewkw5zkzuss6s2h/WarpDrive2.7z](http://www./download/ewkw5zkzuss6s2h/WarpDrive2.7z)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T19:27:45Z" title="08/06/2015 07:27  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by PringleMan**
Roverdude made a standalone warp drive. Not an exact copy but largely works the same way.
